summary: RAPID DETERIORATION OF FRONT FORK SPRINGS CREATING A FRONT END WOBBLE THAT RENDERS THE MOTORCYCLE VIRTUALLY IMPOSSIBLE TO CONTROL.  MOTORCYCLE WAS A HAZARD AND WAS TAKEN TO HARLEY-DAVIDSON DEALERSHIP FOR REPAIR.  DEALERSHIP COULD NOT IDENTIFY CAUSE OF WOBBLE.  NECK BEARINGS REPLACED AT A COST OF $400.  FORK SPRINGS REPLACED.  OLD PARTS ARE AVAILABLE.  *JB
